column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of a human head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°98 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The observed details include the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4461.3281 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5516.0156 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 166.1133 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 299.2676 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1534.5703 mm³, the left putamen of volume 436.3770 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 22.4121 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 272.9004 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 96.2402 mm³ and the left vessel of volume 10.5469 mm³.
